Definition: Given an Amazon food product review and its summary, you must generate "True" if the given review and summary match, or else generate "False".

Positive Examples.input:
I have bought several of the Vitality canned dog food products and have found them all to be of good quality. The product looks more like a stew than a processed meat and it smells better. My Labrador is finicky and she appreciates this product better than  most. 
 Summary: Good Quality Dog Food
Positive Examples.explanation: The customer talked about dog food which was good. So, it's a correct Summary. So, the correct answer is true.

Positive Examples.input:
Product arrived labeled as Jumbo Salted Peanuts...the peanuts were actually small sized unsalted. Not sure if this was an error or if the vendor intended to represent the product as "Jumbo". 
 Summary: Not as Advertised
Positive Examples.explanation: The customer didn't get the product they show in the advertisement. So, it's a correct Summary. So, the correct answer is True.

Positive Examples.input:
Great taffy at a great price.  There was a wide assortment of yummy taffy.  Delivery was very quick.  If your a taffy lover, this is a deal. 
 Summary: Good Oatmeal
Positive Examples.explanation: The customer is neutral with the product and he has some complaint. So the summary is incorrect.

Negative Examples.input:
My daughter loves twizzlers and this shipment of six pounds really hit the spot. It's exactly what you would expect...six packages of strawberry twizzlers. 
 Summary: Lots of twizzlers, just what you expect.
Negative Examples.explanation: It's only supposed to say if the Polarity of given review is "True" or "False"

Negative Examples.input:
I ordered this product for a themed baby shower. They went over well and they tasted just like normal cracker jacks. Loved that I could find the box and they fit perfect in favor bags. 
 Summary: It's a fine cracker
Negative Examples.explanation: It's a correct summary so the answer should be true.

Negative Examples.input:
My cats have been happily eating Felidae Platinum for more than two years. I just got a new bag and the shape of the food is different. They tried the new food when I first put it in their bowls and now the bowls sit full and the kitties will not touch the food. I've noticed similar reviews related to formula changes in the past. Unfortunately, I now need to find a new food that my cats will eat. 
 Summary: My cats loved the food.
Negative Examples.explanation: The customer's cat really didn't eat the food customer order so the summary is wrong. So, the correct answer should be false.

Instances.input:
I bought this machine 1 1/2 years ago, have trouble with it filling the cup and thought, OK, I might try it again, but after reading a number of reviews and the machine is still having the same problem, I will not purchase another Kurig. 
 Summary: great when works, died after 6 months, useless!

Bought this as a gift and was told it tastes really great! Too bad I don't have one of those machines, otherwise, I'd try them out myself.  I might have to consider getting one! If you really like it, you can save some money by subscribing to it for automatic deliveries and to make sure you don't run out. 
 Summary: yummy!!!  And fro Amazon too..........

Think carefully before ordering this product. My experience wasn't good. I don't care for the taste and it gave me unpleasant indigestion. Perhaps some people can digest this stuff, but not me. You have to buy two at a time so it's a risk if you don't like the taste or if it gives you digestion problems, because IT'S A NON-RETURNABLE ITEM. Obviously, many people are fine with this product, but caveat emptor. 
 Summary: GI Distress!

Stash Tea Company Cranberry Pomegranate Price: >$4 ordered in a 3 pack less than $10 (Stash Tea Company Autumn Teas Trio Gift Set, 3-Ounce + Free Shipping) Caff-O-Meter: 0mg Ingredients: Hibiscus; Rooibos; Cranberry Flavor; Pomegranate Flavor Received this as part of a 3 pack of teas for the holidays (Cinnamon Vanilla, Pumpkin Spice and Cranberry Pomegranate). -Smell (2) - The smell is not strong, but it is present. I am not a big fan of the smell of cranberry so that may be why the score is low, if you enjoy that smell you may be surprised. -Taste +Unsweetened: ++Hot (1) - Flavor is very bland, if not for the smell I would think I was drinking hot water with the tiniest bit of flavoring. ++Iced (1.5) - Tastes a bit better over ice. but a bit thinned down *I prefer my teas Iced and 1 cup to .5 packet of sweetener. So unless it wows me, without sweetener will always be lower in points so to compensate I add .5 points to the unsweetened taste average. -Sweetened ++Hot (2.5)- Adding the sweetener (1 pkg of truvia) bring out the flavors a bit more, again I'm not a fan of the flavors so that is apparent in this review but the sweetener definitely improves the flavor. ++Iced (3.5) - Better over ice! The flavor is definitely brought out more by the sweetener, would certainly take this over a sugar laden ocean spray cranberry cocktail or something of that nature. I could even see using this as a mixer in some adult beverages the taste is there for it. -2nd Steep (2.5) - When the tea was steeping the second time I was concerned I was in for further disappointment, the color is certainly lighter but the flavor is about the same level. I always rate this to see how economical a tea is. Summary - My typical everyday go-to iced tea is a blend of hibiscus (for the BP lowering qualities and taste), and other flavors, and I am on a rooibos kick as of late. However as previously stated, I do not typically like the flavors of cranberry and/or pomegranate therefore I would not ordinarily be attracted to this flavor to begin with and am only drinking it because it was included with my order. I will certainly finish the box, but I would not buy it again. If you enjoy the flavor of pomegranate and or cranberry you will most likely enjoy it, and I would certainly not discourage you from it. I have many other tea reviews so keep checking back. To get a better idea of whether or not we have similar tastes in teas check out my profile (I used to actually hate tea). Summary: Bland

I won them off a penny auction site. My 2 year old likes them plenty. I don't think there is any potato flavor, they taste more like ricecakes to me, but are ok. The salt and vinegar is strong holy cow!! 
 Summary: Not bad

I wanted to like this item and had seen the generally favorable reviews.  I loaded it with some liver treats and opened our front door to offer it to my dog-- she grabbed the rope and released it...and it fell about two feet onto the step and cracked!  I was pretty surprised it took that little to break it.  The crack was on the screw-in bottom so it spread and basically the bottom broke and it was useless...back to Amazon, sorry!  Maybe a rubber guard for the bottom would make this a better product? 
 Summary: NOT for genius dogs

I just received the plant.  I paid extra for a quick delivery to secure the plant's condition.  It arrived on time, however it arrived wrapped only in moist news paper,without any protection for the plant.  The plant is completely smashed. This was, for me, a complete waste of my time and money.  I paid more for shipping than for the item itself and it didn't do a bit of good.  Very disappointing. 
 Summary: Item arrived damaged

I had hoped that this would taste like Pina Coladas but it doesn't.  It is rather nasty and left a film on my tongue.  I wanted something to drink after a work out or to give to my kids when we are traveling but it is to hard for me to swallow.  The reason I gave it 2 stars is because it is good in mixed drinks.  I have been able to add it to smoothies and drinks with alcohol.  If you are going to drink this straight, it helps if it is really cold....almost frozen.  If you really like the taste of coconut milk you might like this because that is the only thing I can taste in it, 
 Summary: Well, if this doesn't wake you up, NOTHING will.
